title: Please help me. league patcher being rather insane. i cant play. help. HELP. HELP.
body: Well, i get on league after a boring day, and i am told '' league needs to apply an update, it will automatically update in 10 seconds. so i leave it do its thing and update while i make some coffee, i then come back to the updater telling me it has done 200/5.3mb of download with -9 min to go. i sit there and cry for 2 hours straight. then i restart league, same thing happens, so on, so on. i then restart pc, same thing, i then stop trying for a week, i come back and its still happening. please help me.

replies.body: This could be caused by a security setting that's having issues updating your game files.  Try out the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that access is being allowed.  Let me know if that helps.
